Title: Thorougly implement the health pledge, have common disinfected insecticide-spreading equipment in reserve, practice disinfection, extinguish germs and poisonous insects.
Publisher: Fujian Province Association for the Popularisation of Science and Technology, Fujian Province People's Science Academy (福建省科學技術普及協會, 福建省人民科學館 ), Fuzhou
Notes: The woman in blue (a cadre) points to the "Patriotic Health Pledge" (愛國衛生公約).
